The fund invests mainly in common stocks (growth or value stocks or both) of large and midsize companies worldwide that the manager believes have favorable investment potential. Potential investments include companies involved in the research, development, manufacture, distribution, supply or sale of industrial products, services or equipment. The fund is non-diversified.
